title: Cozy Studio!! Near DTLA!
posting_body: ['0Br / 1Ba available now', 'cats are OK - purrr', 'dogs are OK - wooof', 'apartment', 'no laundry on site', 'street parking', 'Text Erick', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a viewing or for more information.', 'Welcome to your dream homey bright charming home sweet home!!', 'This is a Remodeled NY STYLE Studio available now, for $1,495 per month with a one year lease.', 'Water and Trash is included.', 'This Studio has been updated with Air Conditioning in the Unit.', 'Perfect location for all ages, especially university students!', 'This building is centrally located Near FIDM, USC, Staples Center and minutes away from LA Live.', 'This is an ideal location for anyone that loves the Restaurant Scene in Koreatown and wants to be minutes away from Downtown LA.', 'This location is half a mile from the redline, near the 110 and 10 Freeway.', '(600+ Credit Required)', '1021 South Park View Street has a Walk Score of 95 out of 100.', 'This location is a Walker’s Paradise so daily errands do not require a car.', '1021 South Park View Street is a 15 minute walk from the Metro Purple Line (805) and the Metro Red Line (802) at the Westlake / MacArthur Park Station stop.', '1021 s park view', 'st, la ca, 90006']
